price: (145) Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Fire - and never will you find for them a helper -
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ فِي ٱلدَّرۡكِ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna al-munāfiqīna fī al-darki al-asfali mina al-nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīran
